biotools.summary: This package is an R version of the package MAT and contains functions to parse and merge Affymetrix BPMAP and CEL tiling array files (using C++ based Fusion SDK and BioConductor package affxparser), normalize tiling arrays using sequence specific models, detect enriched regions from ChIP-chip experiments.

bioschemas.name: rMAT
bioschemas.summary: This package is an R version of the package MAT and contains functions to parse and merge Affymetrix BPMAP and CEL tiling array files (using C++ based Fusion SDK and BioConductor package affxparser), normalize tiling arrays using sequence specific models, detect enriched regions from ChIP-chip experiments.
